title: Pricing Component & Custom Markup
description: Developed a reusable, site-wide pricing component and custom markup that replaced legacy code and empowered non-technical teams to configure global pricing, cart links, and popup experiences—boosting A/B testing speed and flexibility. Built with React, vanilla JS, and integrated with a WordPress server database and REST API.

title: SSO Integration for Personalized Access
description: Implemented secure Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality using OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0, allowing users to seamlessly authenticate via internal subscription systems. Built with vanilla JavaScript and WordPress, the solution leveraged a REST API backend to enable tailored user flows, personalized web experiences, and unified identity management across services.

title: This Portfolio
description: You're looking at it! Built with Next.js, React, and Supabase, this portfolio showcases selected projects and skills with a focus on speed, clarity, and accessibility. A visual feature exploring frontend performance is in the works—stay tuned for something interactive soon.
